snippet: After the shooting in Wisconsin, residents of Oak Creek have come together in efforts to open communication.
abstract: Members of the insular Sikh community in Oak Creek, Wisc, welcome an outpouring of support from hundreds of people from different religious backgrounds who have gathered in solidarity after the temple shooting that claimed six lives; community leaders see the incident as an opportunity to overcome religious divides and spread awareness of their faith and culture.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and STEVEN YACCINO

lead_paragraph: After the shooting in Wisconsin, residents of Oak Creek have come together in efforts to open communication.

headline.seo: Wisconsin Community Promotes Tolerance After Shooting
headline.main: After Deadly Shooting at Sikh Temple, Neighbors Turn Out to Work for Tolerance
headline.print_headline: After Deadly Shooting at Sikh Temple, Neighbors Turn Out to Work for Tolerance
